song.englishname: Breathe on Me/I Need Thee Every Hour

english.segment1: In humble adoration. I kneel before Your throne. In brokenness I seek. Your face alone. Above You there's no other. Who's able to restore my soul. Come and make me whole
english.segment2: Breathe on me. Power of God come in and change me. You are all I need. Holy Spirit breathe on me
english.segment3: I'm ready to surrender. To give You all my life. No matter what the cost or sacrifice. Reveal to me Your calling. Cleanse me from my prideful ways. Use me now I pray
english.segment4: Breathe on me. Power of God come in and change me. You are all I need. Holy Spirit breathe on me
english.segment5: I will say of the Lord. He is my strong tower. My rock and my fortress in whom I trust. In times of the storm and in tribulation. He is my help and my salvation
english.segment6: Oh breath of God. Restore my soul
english.segment7: I will say of the Lord. He is my strong tower. My rock and my fortress in whom I trust. In times of the storm and in tribulation. He is my help and my salvation
english.segment8: Breathe on me. Power of God come in and change me. You are all I need. Holy Spirit breathe on me
english.segment9: I need Thee how I need Thee. Every hour I need Thee. O Bless me now my Savior. I come to Thee
